website_summaries.verdict: Boost your dietary fiber with a sugar-free, easy-to-chew gummy. Improve regularity and cholesterol levels.
pros: Five milligrams of fiber per serving, along with six B vitamins to support the metabolic system
Fiber helps to curb the appetite, and we like the addition of the B vitamins for overall health
cons: Takes a good bit of chewing to consume
As with many gummy products, some arrive stuck together or melted

customer_reviews.title: Helped my cholesterol levels!
customer_reviews.text: Cholesterol improves with daily use. Using Vitafusion Fiber Well, my levels dropped from an all time combined of around 240 to just above 200. My doctor no longer pushes me to go on a statin, which is a plus. This is the "Fit" version, which has B vitamins, so I expect the same results. It's harder to chew than the previous, but not a big deal. This is slightly more expensive route in keep my levels down than a generic station, but prefer a more "natural" approach.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Makes you go to the bathroom lol
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for weight loss so far they make me up my water intake and go to the bathroom more I am going to start weighing myself everyday in writing it down to see if there's a difference in weight loss will update with results
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Extra effort by shipper appreciated.
customer_reviews.text: Just based on the packaging and instructions alone I am going to start out with a 5 Star review. After reading other reviews I was concerned about receiving a mass of gummies melted together. Well not a problem. The shipper/supplier placed the order within a insulated box along with a cooling type bag that at one point must have been chilled. Arrived this PM where outside temps have been hovering around 97 degrees in the PM for days. No melted gummies! Great job in taking care with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Filling
customer_reviews.text: Works well to curb appetite and keep things moving. Not sure how else to put that. It's fiber. Works as intended. :)
customer_reviews.author: Life Out Loud

customer_reviews.title: 5 Year Old Doesn't Like Taste
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old has constipation problems which have been solved by the Culturelle Gentle-Go powder. I was using the gummies to keep his fiber high and assist with his constipation/diarrhea problems. Unfortunately, he doesn't like the taste of these gummies. He has tried others that he gobbles like candy but he won't eat these. I tried them and they have an unpleasant after-taste that may be due to the xylitol and sucralose (artificial sweeteners in the gummies). By themselves, the gummies don't manage his constipation problem so I won't make him eat them. I'll feed him the Fiber One bars which he loves and they work well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Wife

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting fiber---whoa!
customer_reviews.text: If you want more fiber in your diet, these are the ticket. I use them especially when on travel, as they are easy to pack in a baggie. Unfortunately, they taste great. I could eat them by the handful--- which is not a good idea. I tried Metamucil powder (yuk), then the capsules. Neither worked as well as these for me.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: A supplement that actually works
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this about 2 months ago, mainly because I'm a bodybuilder and I eat so much food. Having a good digestive system will help ensure that my body is functioning properly, and the 6+ meals I eat a day don't get backed up. Now some people might look at this product and be skeptical because it's a supplement you chew, and usually those taste bad. Not in this case. These taste phenomenal. I would eat the whole bottle but that's just asking for a disaster waiting to happen. Overall, the product absolutely does help, lasts a long time (I take two a day), and tastes fantastic. Great product that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pak

customer_reviews.title: Best Way to Take Fiber
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different ways add fiber to my diet with a supplement and this is by far the best. Citrucel tastes like the bottom of a garbage dumpster and getting through an entire glass of water with that in it is torture. Miralax doesn't have a flavor, but still requires getting through an entire glass of water with an odd texture. These gummies are like a fruit snack! Delicious and do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Megan G

customer_reviews.title: These magical gummies changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product due to one particularly harrowing experience which took place at 6 AM after a long night of partying. As I sat upon the hotel’s porcelain throne letting out guttural wails of agony that could put even the most brutal of death metal vocalists to shame, I realized that I needed more fiber in my diet. It was on that day that I delved into the deepest recesses of Amazon to learn the secrets of the dark side. While I have yet to master the ability to shoot lightning from my fingertips, I can safely say that I have not had to expel any more demonic entities from my body since purchasing these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden

customer_reviews.title: Recomend
customer_reviews.text: I like it’s realy good help me to use the bathroom more and more energy but the only thing I didn’t like is that I’m allergic to seafood and they didn’t put it on the label when u about to buy but in the bottle says prices in a facility with products egg, fish ‘ shellfish , soy and tree nuts. But thanks to the Lord it’s being good and haven’t had no Symptoms so it’s good
customer_reviews.author: aleli

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I had no real expectations since Ive never been regular and constant constipation. But as soon as i started eating these delicious gummies I am using the bathroom daily :) Makes me happy and not bloated!
customer_reviews.author: GILLIAN

customer_reviews.title: If you need some extra fiber and can't stand the taste of powders...
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty Fiber and 0 points on WW! I can't really tel how well they work, but I can't tell how any supplements really work! I do know that these are damn tasty and much easier to consume than powders and pills. I word certainly stay away from Metamucil which has a high sugar content, or the no sugar version which has chemicals in it. Also, Psyllium Husk works well, however it gets clumped up when you mix it and it tastes, wel, like husks! If you need more fiber in your life, these are the ones to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jdiesel77

customer_reviews.title: These Fiber Gummies came in melted
customer_reviews.text: Thee are Fiber Gummier, that came in once all melted together in a ball. they didn't keep them in a cool container. they sent me another bottle, but again the were melted into one big ball. They were not exactly "gone bad" but they can lose their property of working as they should after the heat was that bad. They were nice as far as working with me, but I wished they would put them in a container to keep them where they don't melt in the hot days of summer.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Steele

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Hard to chew & not very tasty. Been taking for 4 weeks and no poop yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Buck

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Supplements
customer_reviews.text: I love, love,love these gummy supplements. They taste good, contain much-needed B vitamins, and help to keep me regular, too. My daughter loves them, too, so I bought her her own bottle.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Consistently my favorite chewable fiber; consistent flavor and chewable
customer_reviews.text: I continue to prefer this brand over any of the readily available generic alternatives. The flavors are consistently enjoyable and do not taste overly sugary, which is something I'd strongly prefer to avoid when I take them in the morning or with breakfast. The packaging and bottle is well-sealed, ensuring the vitamins will not dry out and will remain chewy, another problem I've had with generic fiber chewables. I'm a very pleased customer in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Love these!! Order them now!  Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: When you can get these, get them. Best ever and they work as an appetite suppressant as well. I can hardly find this on Amazon and never at the stores. So, when I can find a bottle for under $9, I grab a few. Best ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy but large gummies
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I really notice any difference from taking these but overall they are flavorful and easy to chew. Since they are yummy, I feel like I remember to take them more often. I do wish they were also slightly smaller so you could get more chews per bottle, as the dummies are fairly large. Observed no adverse reaction. Overall product is okay!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted it to work. Unfortunately it made my stomach hurt severely worsened my digestion/stomach issues way worse than before taking this product :( not sure where it went wrong. It may work for others but not for me. They gave me a full refund immediately though. So i can say they have 10 stars in costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Improved Digestive Health, I am finally regular
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from constipation for most of my life. This product is a life saver. Not only has it helped me, it has had life changing benefits for my family too. My sister recommended this fiber supplement to me and I am so glad that I am finally regular and no longer suffer from constipation. I no longer have to take laxatives or cramp causing enemas to have a bowel movement.
customer_reviews.author: LindseyAshlyn

customer_reviews.title: These are a gamechanger
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I had to for this product. I've suffered from chronic constipation basically since childhood. I'm now 25. Just finished my first bottle of these and they have changed my life. Since using these, haven't had any problems at all with constipation. I've been going regularly every day. They taste great and are easy to eat. Highly recommend these gummies if you're having some problems with being regular
customer_reviews.author: Akash Lohia

customer_reviews.title: Very chewy!
customer_reviews.text: You really have to chew these up! They’re very chewy, which I’m not a big fan of, but they work well! It seems like they go to work quite quickly, too! Most fiber supplements take days to start working, but these go to work by the next day.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Better Alternative to fiber drinks
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of fiber drinks so this is such a great alternative. The flavor is really good. You don't even feel like you are taking fiber vitamins...just tastes like a little gummy treat. I cannot compare its effectiveness against fiber drinks because I can't stand them and don't drink them, but these seem to be okay. At least they taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to chew as they r very gummy. They taste ok not awful I just had a hard time chewing these. I use alive gummy vitamins and those chew easily also vitafusion calcium are easy to chew so these are just more like rubber so they don't chew up very easy takes awhile to get them down..
customer_reviews.author: pinky pink

customer_reviews.title: Made my stomach hurt
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product 3 stars. The gummies are good and the shipment was good. These made my stomach hurt. I took them for several days and noticed my stomach was hurting every day. I stopped taking them and after a couple of days my stomach stopped hurting. So I know it was from these.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down, the best fiber I have tried. Doesn't upset my stomach, and helps greatly with water weight as well as bloating. The FIT version is the best. I had an issue with the seller, but not only did they replace it- they gave me a refunded discount! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to work
customer_reviews.text: Tried 2 gummies per day for a week, not only it didn't work, also made the constipation even worse. Don't want to give it a 1 star because I understand everybody is wired differently, what not work for me might work for you. The flavor is not bad though!
customer_reviews.author: Elora Knowles

customer_reviews.title: I really like these gummies and continue to buy them
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gummies and continue to buy them. I have never been a "regular" pooper, I always have constipation issues. The gummies help to keep me going regularly, and they taste good!
customer_reviews.author: bobbie.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fiber Gummies
customer_reviews.text: Love these gummies! They have 5 grams of fiber for 2 gummies with only 10 calories! I also love the flavors! They are chunky and tasty. (Not hard and dried out) Eating these when I don't get all my veggies and fruit. The "Fit" version also has added vitamins. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Savoca

customer_reviews.title: beware
customer_reviews.text: gummies are yummie and very big and chewy- HOWEVER, did not make me use restroom, instead gave me constant sharp pain on chest after use
customer_reviews.author: peach

customer_reviews.title: Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: I'm cured! I can't eat meat, wheat, or dairy without experiencing constipation. This has solved my problems immediately. Downsides: Takes about 13 hours to work. Makes me gassy so it's best to use when alone.
customer_reviews.author: L. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Not gonna finish the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Tried these twice before giving up. The taste is very plain like you're eating plain gelatin or something (not a flavor or texture I'd prefer eating). They have a slight fruity flavor. Made my stomach upset both times I ate them. I decided to stop eating them and I'm gonna try to get more fiber through regular foods.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Taste Good
customer_reviews.text: These fiber gummies taste great and they help me get the fiber that I lacked. My doctor let me know my fiber in my system was low and ever since I took these and revisit my doctor she mentioned that my fiber has been getting better. So these gummies are doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed or my bottles have gone bad
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for many years. Always a great taste. I opened one of my new bottles and there is an odd , almost soured smell and the state is somewhat rancid. I tried a second bottle , same thing. I wish I knew how to contact seller to discuss if the bottles could be bad or if the product has changed. The Exp date say 03/20 and the bath number seems to be the name on all 4 bottles. Something is clearly wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Haffenreffer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe having an opening at the top and the bottom of the bottle would be more convenient for users.
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor of these gummies and I hope they work the way they are described to work. I do not like how they stick together in the bottle but I should be able to figure out a way to get them out with a knife or by banging the bottle I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Montpetit

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your fiber
customer_reviews.text: Out of all of the choices these seems to be the best value to get your fiber. Easy to chew and tastes ok as well. Two is a serving sizes, some other brands require you to eat three or more so you end up with less.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A great way to get your daily fiber
customer_reviews.text: A great way to get your daily fiber. Whenever I want something sweet instead of grabbing a piece of candy I would take a piece of these as they are so yummy and so much better for you. Helps me to get in that fiber that I need so desperately. The flavors are good and the gummy‘s are easy to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B.

customer_reviews.title: The answer to constipation  AMEN
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from constipation this will take care of getting you back on a normal schedule. I take 2 in the morning along with 1 chewable Magnesium and my life is much improved. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: California Gal

customer_reviews.title: A Little Like Eating Rubber
customer_reviews.text: These fiber gummies are a bit like eating rubber. They do not have very much flavor and are extremely chewy. Other brands of fiber gummies are much better tasting and provide equivalent fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Jamsmith

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as in the stores - don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for awhile from a regular store (Walmart, Kroger) and it works very well. I thought I'd save myself some time by ordering this product online. Wasted my money, as these are definitely NOT the same. One fiber gummy is usually enough to be effective. Two definitely work. However, with this bottle I ordered online, I can eat 3-4 a day and nada. Nothing. Unfortunately for me, I missed the return date. Do yourself a favor and buy these elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous taste lol, the taste is way too good I will buy it just has healthy candys lmao while they help me go
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, like eating gummy bears
customer_reviews.text: I was taking these while I was pregnant. I had a C-section and kept on taking them as I was recovering. As you know days after a major surgery it is hard to go number 2 and these fiber helped made my journey easy. 2 is recommended, but I've taken 3 at times if I couldn't go.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Do to medications I have issues staying regular and these work better than anything I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry McEntire

customer_reviews.title: I don't know
customer_reviews.text: Why, but I keep ordering these thinking I won't be able to poop one day. I keep pooping so I ordered extra for my grandmother. She asked if they are chewable. Boy, are they ever!!
customer_reviews.author: vino_addict@yahoo.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging for me 70us to clear.
customer_reviews.text: Ok this product is good but the packaging was so bad. Cost me 70us to clear because of the big box and heavy bags of liquid used in packaging. Terrible packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take, flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Even the sugar free taste regular. I like sugar and usually avoid sugar free stuff. I take 1 everyday to keep me regular. The label says to take 2 a day. I may be a rebel!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Boys

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They work, however they are kind of flavorless but I recommend them. Occasional gas throughout the day but that’s what happens when you take fiber lol
customer_reviews.author: SUSIE683

customer_reviews.title: Check your prices
customer_reviews.text: You need to check your prices on this item. Something is definitely wrong. One is bottle is$9.88 with a total of 90 count 2 with each a count of 90 per bottle is $64.50.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Mckinnon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fiber gummy. It truly helps with constipation and tastes like a gummy candy. I usually take 2 daily and occasionally will take one more if I’m craving something sweet. I’m so glad I found it here as I’m struggling with finding this same formula at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Upset Stomach
customer_reviews.text: The major result I got from taking these is an upset stomach. I pitched them.
customer_reviews.author: 21Scholar

customer_reviews.title: This product was shipped with a cold pack to prevent ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was shipped with a cold pack to prevent the gummies from sticking together. I use the Vitafusion Fiber Gummies, but not the 'Fit'. I really haven't seen a difference. Think I'll stay with my original gummies from Vitafusion.
customer_reviews.author: Val M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite over-the-counter gummie fiber. They taste good and work well. I've reordered several times and will keep taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna DM Yates

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these being that I’ve always had digestive issues, however, I feel like it was a waste of my money. and I won’t be buying anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Flushed hot face after taking
customer_reviews.text: Made me sick. I think it was the nician in it. Flushed hot face feeling.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Cooper. Honest reviews.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK! DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the amazing reviews how it helps so many people go to the bathroom. People are saying they take 2 and it works great. Well I take 4 and still nothing happens! Its like im eating regular gummie bears. This is not a real fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Jasman Nayebyan

customer_reviews.title: Really chewy without amazing flavor, probably won't buy them again
customer_reviews.text: This is a really chewy gummy. The flavor isn't horrible, but it's not amazing either. It's my least favorite of my morning supplements. I always leave it for last.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knapton

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and works well
customer_reviews.text: I always felt like the gummies were for kids but it saves me having to choke down more pills. The taste is great and it does the trick. I feel like I’m doing good and getting a little treat.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: A Treat to Take!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my doc. Easy to take. I chew one in the morning and one in the evening. I like the added benefit of the B Vitamins, as the tablet forms of B usually bothers my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Geeja

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are lifesavers. I was always constipated and in extreme pain before I finally decided to get SOMETHING with fiber, and it turns out these work really well. I saw a major change in about 2 days in my bowel habits and I haven't stopped taking them since. ( plus side is they also taste super good) I will definitely be a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Schulien

customer_reviews.title: Despite all the positive reviews, I would make sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the positive reviews, I would make sure to double check receipt of your product. This morning, I was about to consume two of these gummies, only to realize that one had mold on it. Double check!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time but I feel they could do a better job insulating the product. My package got delivered while I was at work. I am a firefighter so I was at work for 24 hours, come home to find all the gummy’s melted as one. Now the product is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor and texture!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THEM!!! Usually this supplements are very gooey but this ones are not at all! Will keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a substitution for my regular brand because they weren’t available on Amazon. I did not like the taste of these at all. They have a bitter aftertaste. I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Yummm
customer_reviews.text: Came with ice pack to keep from sticking together in one glob. Which would happen fast here in Az! Taste good
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that this was probably the best packaged item that I've ever received. It had a ice pack in it and was well insulated. They taste pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: HeatHunny

customer_reviews.title: Great fiber, easy to take but keep away from children
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take and seems to do what they are designed for. My doctor recommended that I try them. Keep away from children but, if you don't have children in the house, they are a great product
customer_reviews.author: dragmorian mom

customer_reviews.title: The best gummmies out there
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite brand and it does work great for me, happy customer. The only downside a little bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Okay
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was more fiber content per serving but otherwise it is sufficient. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good good
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but wish they would make the bigger bottle available for a lower price then costco
customer_reviews.author: LT in SA

customer_reviews.title: We like these
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the house (5 of us) like these. Taste great, no issues with melting/shipping (& we're in Texas!). These are in our monthly auto-ship order.
customer_reviews.author: texascutie

customer_reviews.title: Ew
customer_reviews.text: Tastes gross so I don't take them. Maybe they are good for you but I wouldn’t know because they leave a bad taste in my mouth so I just don’t eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty gross. They are very dense and hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty gross. They are very dense and hard to chew. Plus the flavor isn't very good. I wouldn't order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fiber and vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I am not 100% sure it helps me or give me a hard time. Let me try one more month because it contains vitamins as well.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, affordable but...
customer_reviews.text: As a fiber supplement, I couldn't recommend. It's a great idea though. Just wish it would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Decent Taste - No clumping!
customer_reviews.text: For gummies they have a decent taste. The package was delivered well and I had no issues with clumping.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stale and hard
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed they were hard and stale I thought they were supposed to be gummies
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, great value and they work
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting! Easy to swallow and they work. Keep away from kids so they’re not confused with candy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The taste is gross
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these! When you first taste them they are great but the aftertaste is so gross. I won’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. I only docked stars because they were kind of melted and sweaty when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Taste like candy, unable to measure results
customer_reviews.text: Unable to measure what these "fiber" did for me since it didn't change anything for my metabolism. They taste okay, I wish it didn't have so much sugar in it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavor
customer_reviews.text: I wont be without these. Great flavor and keep me on track with my daily fiber.
customer_reviews.author: tabykat7

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I like these fiber supplement easy to take and the price is good,sadly my local walmart doesnt also carry them,so i will purchase at amazon
customer_reviews.author: EFC

customer_reviews.title: Not for chronic severe constipation
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these didn’t work me but I have problems with chronic constipation not just your occasional slight constipation. They do taste delicious.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: These will make you poop.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. One thing I will say is THEY WILL MAKE U HAVE TO GO!! Which is mostly what me and my husband use them for lol if we’re feeling a little backed up we take 2 and get cleared out. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I tried at least 8 different fiber/probiotic items. 1st to work. Love this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these BY ACCIDENT lol and they actually have MORE FIBER and are filled with B Vitamins. No sugar and they’re good!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Good taste works so good all my kids take them my mom and I also take them great prouduct. Got here fast and it was packeged perfect...
customer_reviews.author: Maria H.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to chew
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the hardest chewing gummies I’ve ever had. They are tough and don’t dissolve well. Won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Toenies II

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Worked within 2 days, taste delicious, and easy to chew. Finally something that regulates my system without being disgusting to take!
customer_reviews.author: AKM12321

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed by the cooling ice pack that was included with shipping. It kept them from melting, and I plan to reuse it. That is extra and unexpected bargain! The gummies taste good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Genenda Lane

customer_reviews.title: Works great and gummies all in 1
customer_reviews.text: I needed to start taking a fiber supplement and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinecjb

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good - helps
customer_reviews.text: I eat 2 of these before leaving for work each morning. They seem to be helping. I am ten days in, and plan to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Lynn

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: You have to tap hard on the container to loosen the Gummies ‘cause they stick together. Other than that, they taste good... and most of all, they “work”!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: I want to move it move it.
customer_reviews.text: When you want to move it move it...take two. Be warned, these taste great. You got to be careful not to eat much more than 2, you'll blow it.
customer_reviews.author: YouMaybeRightIMaybeCrzy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Get Any Better Than These
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious -- I love taking them, and they keep me regular. I have not had any "issues" since I've started these, in fact this was my second order. Will continue to keep these close by
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The taste is surprisingly nice and the texture is softer than a gummy bear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for their higher fiber vs serving size/calorie ratio. The taste is surprisingly nice and the texture is softer than a gummy bear. Added b vitamins is certainly a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes u go
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor, sugar free and really helps move things along
customer_reviews.author: ex2mommy

customer_reviews.title: No more back-up
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the mail moving and can pretend you are having a little bit of dessert as you chew this flavor-able gummy. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Fyredown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take I recommended good price
customer_reviews.text: Very good vitamin works well with all the vitamins that I take thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Antonio J.....

customer_reviews.title: What a good price
customer_reviews.text: Being regular is very important when you have back issues and diverticulosis. Well this works wonderful and has additional vitamins as well and is sugar free!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Burns

product_meta.title: Vitafusion Fiber Well Fit Gummies Supplement, 90 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: vitafusion Fiber Well FIT gummies help you get the fiber you may need to support digestive health with 5 grams of prebiotic fiber in each delicious, sugar-free gummy serving with the added benefit of 6 B vitamins to support the metabolism of fat, carbs, and proteins[1]. Fiber Well Fit comes in delicious, natural peach, raspberry, and berry flavors, so you can enjoy your fiber. Each serving contains: 5 grams of fiber to support regularity and support digestive health[1], 6 high potency B vitamins to support fat, carb and protein metabolism for cellular energy[1]. At vitafusion, we believe taste and nutrition can be fused together to deliver the best vitamin experience, ensuring it’s an easy and delicious part of your day. For over 12 years, we’ve been helping people to live happy and healthy lives with our gummy vitamins and supplements. Anything is possible when great nutrition is your foundation. Take a fruitful step toward a healthier, happier world with America’s #1 gummy vitamin brand. Vitamin Better! [1] These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: 5 grams of fiber to support regularity and support digestive health[1]
6 high potency B vitamins to support fat, carb and protein metabolism for cellular energy[1]
Natural Peach, Raspberry and Berry Flavors
Contains NO high-fructose corn syrup, NO gluten and NO synthetic (FD&C) dyes
Recipient of the 2018 ChefsBest Excellence Award. The ChefsBest Excellence Award is awarded to brands that surpass quality standards established by independent professional chefs.
